description:
For long days of Nordic touring, the Vitane Plus Prolink boot offers a customizable fit with the added warmth of Thinsulate™. These boots are generously sized for all day comfort, with a semi-rigid cuff to balance support with flexibility.

  • Women's specific fit with narrower heel and lower instep volume
  • Thinsulate™ R 78% liner is made from at least 78% recycled materials
  • Custom Fit thermo-moldable foam and Lycra offers a personalized fit
  • Sanitized anti-bacterial treatment keeps inners odour-free
  • Quick-lace speed lacing system with zip-up lace covers
  • Ergonomic flexible cuff has Velcro® strap for a secure fit
  • Touring fit is slightly generous for long-term comfort and 105mm width
  • Classic flex pattern is designed for good forefoot flex, with stiffer rear flex to add torsional rigidity
  • Prolink soles are NNN compatible and provide a low-profile boot to binding connection for exceptional snow feel
name: Salomon Vitane Plus Prolink Classic Boots - Women's
